projects.title: ExploreSelf: AI-driven Personal Reflection System
projects.description: Led development of adaptive guidance system using Large Language Models for fostering user-driven exploration and reflection on personal challenges.

projects.title: Location-Based Sales Prediction Model
projects.description: Developed GraphSAGE-based model for FnB franchise sales prediction, reducing RMSE by 10.6% compared to manual expert predictions.

projects.title: VENETA Multi-Issuer Blockchain System
projects.description: Designed and developed MVP for blockchain-based P2P trading system. Selected for government-sponsored Financial Regulatory Sandbox.

projects.title: DEATH's WORD CHAIN Game
projects.description: Interactive vocabulary learning game developed while studying GRE words. Combines educational content with engaging gameplay mechanics.
